name: Bottle Match
description:
Bottle Match is a new Match 3 puzzle and the first Match 3 game to use Collectible Card Game mechanics! Collect cards and customize your deck to beat the game and climb the leaderboards!

Conquer all levels and play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bottle Match is completely free to play! You can buy gold in-game or earn gold by playing.

  • Fantastic looking graphics!
  • Play cards to get higher scores!
  • Earn gold and buy better cards!
  • Combine cards and find your play style!
  • Easy and fun to play, challenging to master!
  • 100+ levels to conquer!
  • New daily challenge every day!
  • 6 new weekly challenges every week! Earn gold and cards just by playing. Focus on those goals!
  • Global leaderboards with competitors from around the world!
  • Connect to Facebook to unlock the friend leaderboard and play with your friends!
  • Sync the game between devices when connected to Facebook!
